mapper.sql: id, orderCode, orderName, userCode, projectCode, inserTime, updateTime
mapper.select: select o.*,ui.realName as username ,pm.projectName as projectname from order_manage as o left join user_info ui on o.userCode=ui.userCode left join project_beauty_manage pm on o.projectCode=pm.projectCode where o.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select om.inserTime,bm.projectName as projectname,bm.projectMoney as projectCode from order_manage om left join project_beauty_manage bm on om.projectCode=bm.projectCode where usercode = #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by om.inserTime desc

select o.*,ui.realName as username ,pm.projectName as projectname from order_manage as o left join user_info ui on o.userCode=ui.userCode left join project_beauty_manage pm on o.projectCode=pm.projectCode
where o.orderCode = #{ordercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into order_manage (id, orderCode, orderName, userCode, projectCode, inserTime, updateTime) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into order_manage
id,
orderCode,
orderName,
userCode,
projectCode,
inserTime,
updateTime,

mapper.update:
update order_manage
orderCode = #{ordercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
orderName = #{ordername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
userCode = #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
projectCode = #{projectcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
inserTime = #{insertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update order_manage set orderCode = #{ordercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orderName = #{ordername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userCode = #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, projectCode = #{projectcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inserTime = #{insertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
